metadata.title: CVE-2013-4566 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: mod_nss 1.0.8 and earlier, when NSSVerifyClient is set to none for theserver/vhost context, does not enforce the NSSVerifyClient setting in thedirectory context, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-nss package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
